title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message:
Hi!

I have this A1502 with cracked lcd.
Changed it, but now i have random graphical glithches.
If i put external display with hdmi connection i don't have problems with both screens :/

What i can check?
Thanks

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: Can you take a video or picture of the graphics glitches? This could of course be a CPU or RAM issue...

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message:
Sure!
It starts with perfect image, and then after 2/3 seconds:



[ATTACH type="full" width="30%"]50905._xfImport[/ATTACH]

and then it gets worse:

[ATTACH type="full" width="30%"]50906._xfImport[/ATTACH]

Then if i connect hdmi external display i can use both normally.
I managed to install osx without problems, but day later started acting weird.

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: That is very very likely a fucked CPU. RIP.

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message:
Nice! :)
Can i test it somehow to be 100% sure?

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: Disconnect LCD and test external monitor, or test known good LCD; just in case.

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message:
Damn, at the moment i don't have that exact model...(of LCD)
Disconnected LCD and tried with external, the image is always perfect!

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message:
why dont you use cracked lcd as a test screen? this glitch looks fat enough to be visible on the old screen as well. 
whould be rather funny to know thats a firmware issue

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: i'll do both (if necessary) and reply, thanks

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: I'll add that if i boot from room temperature it works fine until i stress-test it and temps get higher!

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message:
Looks like CPU issue.
External video still OK then?
Is better to discard LCD in any case...

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: External video ok, tried now with another lcd and have exact problems

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: Then LCD output of CPU is bad...

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message: ...and no way to fix it i presume...

title: ?A1502/4924 graphic glitches
message:
Use it as iMac, with external monitor.
Or transform an old TV (with HDMI) to Smart TV...
